Class Text

  • java.lang.Object
    • aed.spelling.Text
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Text
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Represents a text identified by its id
    Author:
    Andre Pontes (42845) <am.pontes@campus.fct.unl.pt>, Goncalo Marcelino (43178) <gb.marcelino@campus.fct.unl.pt>
